Package utilities

Interface Summary
Transmutable<I,O> generic method to transform an object into another one
 

Class Summary
CArrayList<E> read only array list backed by a C-style array of references
a list view of an array can also be obtained via
public static List java.util.Arrays.asList(T...
CodeWriter helper class to build source code strings/streams
CStyleArray2Array3DTransmuter creates an Array3D from a plain c-style array
DelayedAction performs a delayed task after action has been called, specify delay in ms
Env loads environment for multiple classes from a json file
Invoker this class provides utility methods for invoking a generic method
may also be used as stand alone programme
issues: curretly it does not work to invokeMethod a static main, there seems to be some trouble with javas varargs handling
JavaEcho print passed args as java system property e.g.
JVM singleton class which provides access to global (JVM wide) settings
MachineInfo information about host machine
MatrixReader creates a multi dimensional double matrix from an input stream
MiscTool static methods for miscellaneous stuff
OSTool utility methods for OS specific stuff
OutputStreamWriterTool provies utility methods regarding output streams
PingTool measures the duration to open a socket on given host and port
PipeTransmuter<I,O> simple transmuter which just returns the input data
PrintBit prints the operation mode: 32, 64 or unknown
PrintTime prints milliseconds since January 1 1970 UTC (midnight)
RAMInfo print the amount of installed RAM on the host machine (physical memory) in bytes to standard out
Timing helper class to measure cpu/wallclock times for the jvm or single threads
 

Exception Summary
MiscTool.NotEqualException
